╨Т╨░╨║╨░╨╜╤Б╨╕╤П

Snr Java Software Engineer

Requirements:

- 5 + more year's experience

- Experience of server side programming of Java (Windows, Linux), J2SE, Swing, Spring, Hibernate, JUnit, RMI, ClearCase, MQ, Webservices, XML.

- Database : Oracle and Sybase.

- Unix and Ant scripting.

- Trading and Finance experience.

- 5 + more year's experience

Additional Skills:

- Experience of development in an agile environment - Scrum, XP, iterative, pair programming, test driven development, refactoring, continuous integration.

- Experience of Eclipse development environment.

- Subversion source control.

- Knowledge of the securities lending business.

We offer:

- High salary +

- Financial stability

- 24-day paid vacation, 100% paid sick leave

- 8-hour working day and 5-day working week

- Flexible working schedule

- Corporative and social events

- Convenient office location in the center

- English Courses

- Medical insurance

╨а╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░ ╨▓ ╨Ъ╨╕╨╡╨▓╨╡; ╨а╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░ ╨▓╨╛ ╨Ы╤М╨▓╨╛╨▓╨╡; ╨а╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░ ╨▓ ╨Ю╨┤╨╡╤Б╤Б╨╡; ╨а╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░ ╨▓ ╨Ф╨╜╨╡╨┐╤А╨╛╨┐╨╡╤В╤А╨╛╨▓╤Б╨║╨╡; ╨а╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░ ╨▓ ╨Ф╨╛╨╜╨╡╤Ж╨║╨╡; ╨а╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░ ╨▓ ╨е╨░╤А╤М╨║╨╛╨▓╨╡;

Copyright ┬й 2000-2010 ╨Ю╨Ю╨Ю ┬л╨а╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░ ╨Ш╨╜╤В╨╡╤А╨╜╨╡╤И╨╜╨╗┬╗.

╨Т╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨░ ╨╖╨░╤Й╨╕╤Й╨╡╨╜╤Л ╨╕ ╨╛╤Е╤А╨░╨╜╤П╤О╤В╤Б╤П ╨┤╨╡╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╤Г╤О╤Й╨╕╨╝ ╨╖╨░╨║╨╛╨╜╨╛╨┤╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛╨╝ ╨г╨║╤А╨░╨╕╨╜╤Л. ╨Ш╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╗╤М╨╖╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╝╨░╤В╨╡╤А╨╕╨░╨╗╨╛╨▓ ╤Б ╨┤╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤Б╨░╨╣╤В╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╖╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╤Б ╨┐╨╕╤Б╤М╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤А╨░╨╖╤А╨╡╤И╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П ╨║╨╛╨╝╨┐╨░╨╜╨╕╨╕ ╨Ю╨Ю╨Ю ┬л╨а╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░ ╨Ш╨╜╤В╨╡╤А╨╜╨╡╤И╨╜╨╗┬╗. ╨Р╨┤╨╝╨╕╨╜╨╕╤Б╤В╤А╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П ╤Б╨░╨╣╤В╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╡╤В ╨╛╤В╨▓╨╡╤В╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨╖╨░ ╤Б╨╛╨┤╨╡╤А╨╢╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨╝╨╡╤Й╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╤Е ╨╛╨▒╤К╤П╨▓╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╣.
